channel.title: Tradeing help delta
channel.description: what do i do so staff cant trade any one no thx rep ++

item.title: Tradeing help delta
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:5, topic:381778”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=477588.msg3494442#msg3494442 date=1297201000]
I can’t believe I get to post the same reply in two topics in less than 5 minutes, I just had to change one letter.

"I’ll help. First off, ‘tradeing’ is in fact spelled ‘trading’.

As for preventing staff from trading, look in client class for

public void tradeReq(int id)

In that method below

client other = (client) handler.players[id];

Add

if (other.playerRights > 0 || playerRights > 0) { sM("Staff members cannot trade."); return; }"
[/quote]

I was going to help :([/quote]
Me too. :’(

Read full topic

I can’t believe I get to post the same reply in two topics in less than 5 minutes, I just had to change one letter.

"I’ll help. First off, ‘tradeing’ is in fact spelled ‘trading’.

As for preventing staff from trading, look in client class for

In that method below

if (other.playerRights > 0 || playerRights > 0) { sM("Staff members cannot trade."); return; }"

item.title: Tradeing help delta
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

firststartoff by goin intoscleintjava anddonfd.

Did you understand that above sentence?

Probably not, and nor did I understand your post, I had to read it over several times.

Also, it should be in your trading packet/method, I forget which one it is.

Please use proper English, and if your first language isn’t English, use Google Translator or something
